channel.title: [508]starting screen[508[
channel.description: Ello, i need help with changing the starter screen when you first log in to the 508, where it says "message of the week" and all that stuff. Can someone please tell what file i cant find that in, thanks -Matt Again, i need help editing this screen [URL=http://img152.imageshack.us/my.php?image=508wootht7.jpg][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/2061/508wootht7.th.jpg[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL] post if you know, thanks.

item.title: [508]starting screen[508[
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:5, topic:236983”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=312842.msg2492015#msg2492015 date=1224189261]
Check Login.java and Frames.java.
I know for a fact, login is one. but Frames I’m not so sure of.
[/quote]
Yes, Login.java is probably what your looking for. Search for the text, and then replace it. However, please do not make useless polls in topics.[/quote]
Hmm, but towards the top of a 508, theres letters incased, that look like part of the frame. Wouldn’t it be frames.java for that part?

Read full topic
